plot: A young man leers through a peephole in the wall separating two dressing rooms, but he is caught, and is humiliated by his victim.
title: Peeping Tom in the Dressing Room
plot_es: A young man leers through a peephole in the wall separating two dressing rooms, but he is caught, and is humiliated by his victim.
original_name: Peeping Tom in the Dressing Room
plot_en: A young man leers through a peephole in the wall separating two dressing rooms, but he is caught, and is humiliated by his victim.
